mapper.insert: insert into Sangpum (sangCode, price, sangName, typeOne, typeTwo, typeThree, iniStock, remStock, rating, totalRat, ratingCnt, saleRat) values (#{sangCode}, #{price}, #{sangName}, #{typeOne}, #{typeTwo}, #{typeThree}, #{iniStock}, #{remStock}, #{rating}, #{totalRat}, #{ratingCnt}, #{saleRat})
mapper.update: update Sangpum set price = #{price}, sangName = #{sangName}, typeOne = #{typeOne}, typeTwo = #{typeTwo}, typeThree = #{typeThree}, iniStock = #{iniStock}, remStock = #{remStock}, rating = #{rating}, totalRat = #{totalRat}, ratingCnt = #{ratingCnt}, saleRat = #{saleRat} where sangCode = #{sangCode}
mapper.select: select sangColor from Sangpum where sangCode = #{sangCode}
select sangSize from Sangpum where sangCode = #{sangCode}, sangColor = #{sangColor}
select rating from Sangpum where sangCode = #{sangCode}
select review from Sangpum where sangCode = #{sangCode}
select remStock from Sangpum where sangCode = #{sangCode}
select saleRat from Sangpum where sangCode = #{sangCode}
